name: Explore the Sands of Serenity
description: In a time when everything and everybody seems to be in a rush, you find a place where you wold like time to slow down and reflect on the beauty and wonder of the world. As a frequent traveler doing business on the road, such a place is a welcome respite from the stresses of urban living. Such is the tranquility and serenity being offered by the Coron. There you would find simple folks, a very laid back atmosphere, and a beach front that offers time to relax, unwind and meditate. Bring a book, have a drink by the beach side and lose yourself for a moment.
